title: New: Lucy Camp – The Heart Dies
body:
San Jose’s **Lucy Camp** is one of the freshest sounding new artists around right now.

There’s a sincerity and dynamism to her vocal delivery that really elevates her above the competition, most poignantly on latest single, _The Heart Dies_. Channeling the likes of P.O.S., it’s an emotionally raw track, that manages to tackle a whole host of important issues within it’s four and a half minutes, with Camp reaching a near scream by the track’s finale. Check it out below.
